channel.title: Evergreen on jzhao.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in Evergreen on jzhao.xyz

item.title: Website Inspiration
item.description: Fun interactions http://lynnecarty.info/: blobs! Fun way to visualize overlapping tags in a personal portfolio https://www.boboland.xyz/: sick use of spatial canvas https://lfe.

item.title: Rhizome Research Log
item.description: I think research logs tend to generally focus too much on what one did rather than what one felt. This log aspires to have a healthy mix of both.

item.title: Rhizome Proposal
item.description: Companies of the future should derive value from the intelligence they provide on top of existing data rather than have the value be just the data.

item.title: Projects
item.description: This is a list of notable projects that I’ve finished and or currently maintaining. My (considerably longer) list of unfinished ideas can be found here.

item.title: Quotes
item.description: Some quotes to live by. “Choose joy. Choose it like a child chooses the shoe to put on the right foot, the crayon to paint a sky.

item.title: Idea List
item.description: Technical markup any site with a webcrawler + yjs + tldraw markupthis.site is not taken!! daily link share inventory packing simulator but its with tabs… what would affect tab size?

item.title: A Failure Resume
item.description: The nature of resumes means that most people only choose to highlight their successes and wins, but rarely the work, effort, and failures on the way.

item.title: jzhao.xyz
item.description: I’m Jacky. This is my little [[thoughts/hypertext|hypertext]] [[posts/networked-thought|garden]] on the [[thoughts/Internet|Internet]] – make yourself at home! Currently, I’m exploring what agentic, [[thoughts/interoperability|interoperable]], and [[posts/agentic-computing|communal]] technology looks like in my independent research practice.
